my wardrobe is all band tees.

I run for my mom.
I'm looking for a home that is close to a tennis court so I can continue to play my favorite sport.

I'll call my mom over to see the new couch.

content.text: I went to the gym and ran 3 miles today.
Oh, that's impressive! I love running but I can't do more than 2 miles.
I run for my mom. She's battling cancer and I want to be healthy enough to take care of her.
That's really sweet of you. My mom is the best person in my life.
She sounds wonderful. My mom is my best friend too.
I've moved around a lot because my dad is in the Navy. I've been to 16 schools in 12 years.
Wow, that's a lot. I've only lived in the same city my whole life.
I'm not sure where I'm going to end up next. I just bought a new couch though!
That's exciting! What kind of couch is it?
It's a leather sectional. I'm really excited about it.
Nice! I love leather couches. I have a band tee wardrobe and I play video games while I watch my baby on the baby monitor.
That sounds like a fun way to spend a day. I'm going to go call my mom and tell her about my new couch.
Have fun! I'm going to go play some video games
